turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location do you want to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order it from the location on Cross Timbers Road in Flower Mound.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. And what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get an Iced Pumpkin Spice Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And is there a particular type of milk that you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd prefer almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I have one Venti Iced Pumpkin Spice Latte with almond milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have placed your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a wonderful day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too!
